fields.label: Note
fields.instructions: Use <h2> - <h6> tags to mark text headings. Use <b> tag to stylistically offset text and <em> for stress emphasis, i.e., something you'd pronounce differently. For more info on semantic markup see this guide.

fields.label: Sidebar content
fields.name: sidebar_content
fields.instructions: Article sidebar can contain multiple objects, however, for aesthetical reasons, its content should not exceed main text height. To reorder objects drag and move entries by the number on the left side.

sub_fields.label: Video URL
sub_fields.name: url
sub_fields.instructions: URL must be secure: 'https://'. Available services:  YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, Vine, Youku.

sub_fields.label: Video ID
sub_fields.name: video_id_option
sub_fields.instructions: Alternatively, you can enter video ID and select YouTube/Vimeo service.

sub_fields.label: Video ID
sub_fields.name: id
sub_fields.instructions: Enter YouTube or Vimeo video ID. Copy part of the video's URL that contains ID. E.g. http://youtu.be/9D05ej8u-gU.

fields.label: Sources
fields.name: sources
fields.instructions: Add sources and citations. Note: to reorder source items drag by entry number displayed on the left side.

sub_fields.label: Contributor type
sub_fields.name: contributor_type
sub_fields.instructions: Add authors, editors and/or translators. Collapse all hides name fields for compact view. Entered values will be still visible on the webpage.

sub_fields.label: Tip:
sub_fields.message: To reorder source items drag by entry number displayed on the left side. To delete item click on minus icon on the right side.

fields.label: Resources
fields.name: resources
fields.instructions: Add resources and additional reading. Note: Quotation marks, punctuation and formatting are added automatically.

sub_fields.label: Contributor type
sub_fields.name: contributor_type
sub_fields.instructions: Add authors, editors and/or translators. Collapse all hides name fields for compact view. Entered values will be still visible on the webpage.

sub_fields.label: Tip:
sub_fields.message: To reorder resource items drag by entry number displayed on the left side. To delete item click on minus icon on the right side.
